item.title: Bosnian Mystery Crime Series ‘Komar’ Acquired by Beta Film (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: Beta Film has picked up international distribution rights to the Bosnian mystery crime series “Komar,” which celebrated its world premiere a year ago at the Sarajevo Film Festival. “Komar” is produced
